scripts.dex:setup: mkdir -p zk/zkeys && mkdir -p zk/proofs && mkdir -p zk/verification && mkdir -p zk/circuits, && mkdir -p zk/witnesses
scripts.generate-witness: snarkjs wtns calculate circuit.wasm input.json witness.wtns
scripts.steup: snarkjs groth16 setup circuit.r1cs powersOfTau28_hez_final_10.ptau circuit_0000.zkey
scripts.contribute-to-circuit-zkey: snarkjs groth16 contribute circuit_0000.zkey circuit_final.zkey --name="First contribution" --power=26
scripts.exoport-verification-key: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey circuit_final.zkey verification_key.json
scripts.prove: snarkjs groth16 prove circuit_final.zkey witness.wtns proof.json public.json
scripts.verify: snarkjs groth16 verify verification_key.json public.json proof.json
scripts.export-verifier-contract: snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier circuit_final.zkey verifier.sol
scripts.contribute-to-power-of-tau: snarkjs powersoftau contribute powersOfTau28_hez_final_10.ptau circuit_0000.zkey --name="First contribution" --curve=BW6_761
scripts.check: yarn compile && yarn generate-witness && yarn prove && yarn verify
